text: The beauty of having a producer is that you have someone who says, You're finished.
author: Sheryl Crow

text: Comics are so full of amazing work. And I can't look at a drawing of a woman without thinking of, for instance, Wallace Wood and his amazing way of capturing beauty.
author: Frank Miller

text: I cannot go to Montreal without going to Beauty's, my favorite place for breakfast, where I have the Mish-Mash omelet with hot dogs, salami, eggs, green peppers, and onions, and the best banana bread in the world. It's legendary!
author: Gail Simmons

text: Beauty set up distance between other people and me. It warped their behavior.
author: Candice Bergen

text: People see you as an object, not as a person, and they project a set of expectations onto you. People who don't have it think beauty is a blessing, but actually it sets you apart.
author: Candice Bergen
